title: Game suddenly dc like 5 minutes ago, lost one diamond promo game.
body: The game just dc by himself like 5 minutes ago, i was in champ select and lost one of my diamond promo games because of that. Could you guys please restore the game that was taking from me due to the server issues? i was 1-1 in long promos, now im 1-2 with a very disadvantageous position. Especially in a long promo like this, is very heartbreaking to lose one of the games and if the result is to lose the promo is extremely frustraiting and a big waste of time. please help me with this riot. PS: there is nothing wrong with my internet conexion.
